萷字的基本解释

萷
shāo
古同“梢”，树梢。

萷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiāo］
［《集韻》思邀切，平宵，心。］
见“萷蔘”、“萷槮”。
[②]［shāo］
［《集韻》師交切，平爻，生。］
树梢。

萷字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　萷； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1043第03
【集韻】思邀切，音蕭。萷槮，草木茂貌。　又【韻會】蕭疎貌。【宋玉·九辨】萷蕭槮之可哀兮。【註】華葉已落，莖獨立也。　又師交切，音梢。【前漢·司馬相如傳】紛溶萷蔘。【郭註】枝聳擢也。　又【韻會】色角切，音朔。義同。　又【集韻】萷藋，藥草。

萷字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
萷字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Words] 　萷; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1043 Page 03
【Ji Yun】Thinking to cut, the sound is Xiao. It is lush, with lush vegetation.　[Yunhui] Xiao Jiu's appearance. 【Song Yu·Nine Distinctions】Xiao Chan is sad. [Note] The Chinese leaves have fallen, and the stems are independent.　Teacher exchanges again, the sound tip. [Previous Han·Sima Xiangru Biography] Dissolving ginseng. [Guo's Note] The branches are also towering.　[Rhyme Club] The color angle cuts, the sound is new. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] 萷藋, medicinal herb.
